Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • products.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Product
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdultBook, ChildBook

    public abstract class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Product
    Basic book with basic functions
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
